Retro Bowl.description: This is a 2D retro-style football game where your goal is to win the Retro Bowl!
Retro Bowl.controls:
CTRL+W to move forward.
Also, you can drag the mouse to throw the ball.
There is a tutorial to help you play!

Papas Pizzeria.description: Ever wanted to have your own pizza restraunt? Here you go!
Papas Pizzeria.controls:
Use your mouse to click buttons, not make keyboard controls.
There is also a tutorial.

Drift Boss.description: Simple but addictive car drifting game. Collect coins and upgrade your car.

Chess.description: Online board game where your could play against a friend or the computer.
Chess.controls: Use your mouse to drag the piece you want to move

2048.description: 2048 is an easy and fun puzzle game. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile.

College 2048.description: The college edition of the classic 2048 game. Try to get to the MIT tile.

Connect 4.description: Get 4 pieces in a row to win. Play against a friend or the computer.
Connect 4.controls: Click where your want to place your piece

Cupcake2048.description: The cupcake edition of the classic 2048 game. Mix cupcakes together to create new ones!

Ducklife.description: The future of the farm is in your hands! Train your duck then compete in challenges to save the farm.

Ducklife 2.description: Increase your skills via the mini games and win all the races to become the  world champion.

Ducklife 3.description: Collect coins and purchase upgrades to help your duck become world champion.

Ducklife 4.description: Raise a duck to become a professional racer! You can choose an egg to hatch, and customize its appearance.

Elastic Man.description: Satisfying game where you can squish, pull, and distort Morty's head.
Elastic Man.controls: Drag features with mouse or touch-screen

Minecraft.controls: WASD to move, space to jump

Factory Balls.description: You've been hired by the ball factory to create amazing designs. Can you succeed?

Flappy Bird.description: Dodge the tubes and try to beat the high score!

Friday Night Funkin.description: A fun and unique music rhythm game to test your musical knowledge and reflexes.
Friday Night Funkin.controls: Use the arrow keys to play notes

Friday Night Funkin VS Tricky HD Mod.description: A fun and unique music rhythm game to test your musical knowledge and reflexes.
Friday Night Funkin VS Tricky HD Mod.controls: Use the arrow keys to play notes

Friday Night Funkin VS Stickman Mod.description: A fun and unique music rhythm game to test your musical knowledge and reflexes.
Friday Night Funkin VS Stickman Mod.controls: Use the arrow keys to play notes

Friday Night Funkin VS Sonic Mod.description: A fun and unique music rhythm game to test your musical knowledge and reflexes.
Friday Night Funkin VS Sonic Mod.controls: Use the arrow keys to play notes

Friday Night Funkin VS Shaggy 2.5 Mod.description: A fun and unique music rhythm game to test your musical knowledge and reflexes.
Friday Night Funkin VS Shaggy 2.5 Mod.controls: Use the arrow keys to play notes

FNAF 2.description: A horror game in which you work as a newly hired security guard for the night shift.
FNAF 2.controls: Use the mouse to interact with objects

Galactic Wars.description: Fight in the space war between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic.
Galactic Wars.controls:
Arrow keys to move
Click 'n' to fire

Jetpack Joyride.description: Dodge fire and missiles, while collecting coins through all the havoc.

Minigolf.description: Line up your putt for a hole-in-one! Watch our for hills and water traps.
Minigolf.controls: Click and drag with the mouse

Orcs VS Elves.description: Blast away the orcs and elves! Knock them out to get more balls and power up your damage multiplier.
Orcs VS Elves.controls:
Use mouse to aim
Click to shoot

Paper Minecraft.description: The amazing world of minecraft but 2D!
Paper Minecraft.controls:
[WASD] - Move / Jump
 [E] - Open/Close Inventory 
 [Click] - Place or Mine
[1 to 9] - Select Item
[E+hover] - Open / Close Chest, Crafting Table, Door
[Space] - Drop single tile from a stack while dragging.
[F] - Eat food
[N] - Label a sign or chest
[Q] - Drop item
[P] - Pause / Unpause
[T] - Talk / Command
[O] - Save your game
[Shift] - Sprint
[M] - Music / Sounds

8Ball Pool.description: Play 8-ball pool against and friend or the computer. Don't hit the 8ball in!
8Ball Pool.controls: Click and drag with the mouse

Rolling Vortex.description: Dodge the rings and collect coins. Try to beat the highscore!

The Sims 2.description: Follow the story or just live your own life. In here you could do and be whatever you want.

Slope.description: An endless space run game where you need to avoid red obstacles at all costs.

Soccer Free Kicks.description: Train your freekick shooting skills through 15 levels of increasing difficulty!
Soccer Free Kicks.controls: Click and drag with the mouse

Street Fighter.description: A classic fighting game. You will engage in one-on-one close quarter combat against your opponent.

Solitaire.description: Fun and easy to pick up on card game.
Solitaire.controls: Click and drag with the mouse

Tanuki Sunset.description: Play as a racoon on a skateboard. Drift at turns and collect coins. Try to beat the highscore!

Stack.description: Stack the blocks as high as you can. Try to beat the highscore!

Tetris.description: Rotate the shapes to fit them perfectly together. Don't let them reach the top.

UNO.description: Easy and fun card game. The aim of the game is to be the first player with no cards.
UNO.controls: Click and drag with the mouse

Worlds Hardest Game.description: Here it is. The worlds HARDEST game. Think you stand a chance?

The Impossible Quiz.description: It really is impossible. Don't even bother trying to beat it.
The Impossible Quiz.controls: Click and drag with the mouse

Gun Mayhem 2.description: More explosive arena style action! Battle against the AI or with friends in this cartoony platform shooter.

Escaping The Prison.description: Stick figure game where you... Well, escape the prison! You must use everything at your disposal to escape!

Breaking The Bank.description: Attempt to break into a bank, built in the middle of a desert.

Stealing The Diamond.description: Help Henry Stickmin break into a museum and execute a diamond heist.

Infiltrating The Airship.description: Try not to fail during a deadly mission in the sky! Infiltrating the Airship dares you to make risky decisions.

Fleeing The Complex.description: You are trapped inside a small prison cell, and you have to escape not just your cell, but the whole prison!

Appel Platformer.description: Simple and fun platformer game. Try to beat levels in record breaking times!

Paper.io.description: Invade as many lands as possible and become the biggest on the server!

Snake.description: Eat as many apples as you can without overlapping you body or hitting a wall.

Golf Blast.description: Get the ball in the hole in as little swings possible.

Happy Wheels.description: Side-scrolling, physics-based, obstacle course game. Try to get to the end without dying!

Among Us.description: Play as the imposter aboard a space ship. Kill all other players to win.

The Impossible Quiz 2.description: The second edition of the impossible quiz. Think you can beat it?

FNAF World.description: An Indie RPG and a spin-off of the Five Nights at Freddy's series.

FNAF 3.description: 30 years after the events that took place in 5 Nights at Freddy's.

Getting Over It.description: Push, Drag and Throw yourself up the level in your quest to Get Over It.

Drift Hunters.description: An awesome 3D car driving game in which you score points by drifting various cars.
Drift Hunters.controls:
[WASD] - drive
[Space] - handbrake
[c] - change camera
[LShift] - shift up gear
[LCtrl] - shift down gear

Cube Dodge.description: An endless obstacle running game. This game trains visual perception, and reaction time.

Deal or No Deal.description: Deal or no Deal. Try your luck in finding the $1,000,000 briefcase in this game based on the hit TV game show!

Web Swinger.description: Swing from object to object with your webs. Try to get as far as you can and beat your highscore!

Sniper.description: Find your target and eliminate them as quickly as possible.

Storm the House 2.description: A free tower defense game. Those pesky stickfigures are at it again! Defend your castle!

Ping Pong.description: See how many times you can bounce the ball in the air without dropping it!
Ping Pong.controls:
Drag mouse to move paddle
[Click] - drop ball

Tunnel Rush.description: Dodge the objects coming toward you in this endless tunnel. Beat your highscore!

Squid Game.description: Complete the following challenges inspired by the popular show Squid Games.
Squid Game.controls: Click and drag based on the directions given

Ball Blast.description: Shoot the balls and upgrade your cannon, how long can you survive?

Car Parking Chaos.description: Park the car in the yellow parking spot as quick as possible!
Car Parking Chaos.controls:
[Arrow Keys] - move
To park, drive inside a yellow parking spot
(Must be very exact)

Bubble Popper.description: Pop the bubbles by matching the correct colors. Try to beat all the levels!

Happy Room.description: Here tests are taken upon highly durable robots using the newest weapon technologies.

Parking Fury 3D.description: Avoid cops, steal cars, and drive around in this beautiful beach scenery.

FNAF 1.description: The classic Five Nights at Freddy's game. Don't get too scared!

Moto X3M.description: Hop on your dirt bike and ride over jumps, do tricks, and try not to fly off in Moto X3M. Memorize the course and execute your stunts perfectly.

Basketball Stars.description: You can play solo or with a friend as a variety of legendary basketball players.

1v1 LOL.description: Eliminate all other opponents and become the last survivor!

Fall Guys.description: A multiplayer battle royale obstacle course. Be the last one standing!

Rooftop Snipers.description: A pixel-style shooting game. Shoot famous characters off the roof.

Stunt Cars 2.description: Drift, drive off ramps, and do a flip!

Sans Fight.description: Sans is the final boss of the Genocide Route in Undertale.

FNAF 4.description: The final chapter of FNAF radically changes its location and gameplay while upping the level of thrill even further.
FNAF 4.controls:
Use mouse to interact
[Space] - flashlight
Flick mouse down to look behind you
[Click] - close/open door
[x] - hide tips

Pokemon Fire Red.description: Start your journey in Pallet Town where you choose your Pokemon. Take down Team Rocket!
Pokemon Fire Red.controls:
Click the video game controller to see controls.
[Enter] - start
[Shift] - select
[Arrow keys] - move
[z] - a
[x] - b

Pokemon Leaf Green.description: Your mission is to collect all 150 Pok√©mon. Go catch em all!
Pokemon Leaf Green.controls:
Click the video game controller to see controls.
[Enter] - start
[Shift] - select
[Arrow keys] - move
[z] - a
[x] - b

Kirby The Amazing Mirror.description: The Kingdom of Mirrors has been invaded and Kirby's going to need to call for backup.
Kirby The Amazing Mirror.controls:
Click the video game controller to see controls.
[Enter] - start
[Arrow keys] - move
[z] - jump
[x] - suck/release air

Super Mario Bros 3.description: A platoformer action-adventure game of the classic Mario franchise.
Super Mario Bros 3.controls:
Click the video game controller to see controls.
[Enter] - start
[Arrow keys] - move
[z] - select/jump
[x] - back/attack

Clash Royale.description: Command your Vikings and destroy the enemy's base in Clash of Vikings. The base is guarded by two towers.

Cat Miner 2.description: A side-view Minecraft-inspired game with a Scratch cat character! Mine, mine, mine!

CSGO Surf.description: A popular game mode in CSGO. You'll be gliding along slopes and flying off of surfaces.
CSGO Surf.controls:
[WASD] - move
[1] - use primary weapon
[2] - use secondary weapon
[3] - use Knife
[r] to reload a weapon
[f] - inspect a weapon
[Click] - shoot/attack

Doge Miner.description: Your mission is to get to the moon! To get there cost 50,000,000,000 dogecoin. Goodluck!

Stack Bump 3D.description: Shoot the tower to make it disappear until the last block while avoiding the black area.

Wordle.description: You have limited attempts to find the word. Goodluck!

Rocket League.description: A fun car soccer 3D game that can be played 1 and 2 player.

Getaway Shootout.description: Race three others to the extraction point. This is no ordinary race as you can only jump your way to the finish line.
Getaway Shootout.controls:
PLAYER ONE
[w] - jump left
[r] - jump right
[r] - power-up

PLAYER TWO
[i] - jump left
[o] - jump right
[p] - power-up

Crossy Road.description: 8-bit endless arcade hopper that started it all. Collect custom characters and navigate freeways, railroads, rivers and much more.
Crossy Road.controls:
[Space] - move forward
[Arrow Keys] - move left and right

Subway Surfers.description: A classic endless runner game. You play as Jake, who surfs the subways and tries to escape from the grumpy Inspector and his dog.

Cookie Clicker.description: Click, click, click. Upgrade your bakery as you get more cookies in this idle game.

Vex 5.description: The fifth platform game in the Vex series. Each level is a labyrinth of deadly devices and traps you have to outsmart.

FNAF Sister Location.description: A point-and-click survival horror video game created to fit in the FNAF series.
FNAF Sister Location.controls:
[Click] - interact
[w] - move in vent
MUST TURN VOLUME ON TO HEAR TASKS

Vex 4.description: The fourth platform game in the Vex series. Each level is a labyrinth of deadly devices and traps you have to outsmart.

Vex 3.description: The third platform game in the Vex series. Each level is a labyrinth of deadly devices and traps you have to outsmart.

Fireboy and Watergirl.description: Help Fireboy and Watergirl work together to get through each maze to the exit.

HexGL.description: A futuristic, fast-paced racing game where you control a hovercraft.
HexGL.controls:
[Arrow Keys] - turn
[Up Arrow] - accelerate
[a] - left brake
[d] - right brake

Mini Golf Online.description: Challenge other players to play golf! Get your golf ball into the hole before your opponent does!
Mini Golf Online.controls: Click and drag to aim and shoot

Cat Trap.description: Try to out smart the cat! Don't let him escape.

Zombs Royale.description: 100 player 2D real-time massive multiplayer Battle Royale game in your browser, inspired by PUBG/Fortnite.
Zombs Royale.controls:
[WASD] or [Arrow Keys] - move
[Click] - attack
[e] - interact
[Space] - deploy

Bloons TD 4.description: A classic tower defense game initially released in Flash. Defend the path by placing various defenses tactically around the map.

Rolling Sky.description: A fun musical skill game. You are a ball rolling over a track with tons of hazards to make you fall.

Basket Random.description: Try to score a basket by using only one key with different variations from each other! Changing fields, changing players and changing balls do not surprise you! The one who reaches 5 score first, wins the game.

Boxing Random.description: Changing conditions occur in every round. Sometimes the boxing field changes and sometimes the boxers. Adapt to every random feature and hit accurately. The one who reaches 5 score first, wins the game!

Economical.description: 2D puzzle action game where saving coins is important! Aiming for a goal using items. Make a way with blocks.

Geometry Dash Remastered.description: Welcome all to Geometry Dash Remastered, and, well, you already know the game. But this is more, this is 5 new levels you can't find anywhere else, this... is REMASTERED(I 'm totally serious).

Hypersnake.description: Hypersnake is a skill game where you have to collect balls to grow your snake and find the path of least resistance to make it as far as possible. How far can you go in Hypersnake?

Madalin Cars Multiplayer.description: Online car driving game in the hugely popular `Mada`lin Cars series. Choose from a range of different sports cars and customize them to your liking. You can change the color and drive settings of your car to give yourself a truly personalized ride!
Madalin Cars Multiplayer.controls:
WASD or arrow keys - move 
 [f] to use nitro 
 [c] to change camera 
 [r] to reset car 
 [i] to start or stop engine 
 [Space] - use handbrake

Madalin Stunt Cars 2.description: 3D stunt driving game featuring some of the world‚Äôs most powerful cars. Jump behind the wheel of your favorite automobile and race around one of the three expansive maps. You can invite your friends to play in any of the online multiplayer servers to share the high-octane thrill.
Madalin Stunt Cars 2.controls:
WASD or arrow keys - move 
 [Shift] to use nitro 
 [r] to reset car

Moto X3M Pool Party.description: A motorbike racing game with summer as the main theme. This 5th part in the Moto X3M series has 22 new challenging levels. Race your motorbike through pools and beaches and discover all the new obstacles in this sequel in the Moto X3M series.

Moto X3M Spooky Land.description: Moto X3M Spooky Land is a stunt motor bike game and is the sixth release in the Moto X3M series. This time with a complete halloween theme where you drive your motor through spooky halloween levels and you have to perform all kinds of stunts to dodge objects of hazards coming your way.

Moto X3M Winter.description: Speed with your motorbike across icy mountains in Moto X3M 4: Winter! This motorbike game dares you to drive on bridges made of candy canes and other sweet treats. Ride a motorcycle past snowmen and Christmas trees with Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer and Santa Claus!

Slope 2.description: The sequel to the Slope game. The gameplay has changed slightly, but the mechanics remain the same. Let me remind you that as the difficulty of each level increases, the ball moves extremely quickly.

Soccer Random.description: Try to score a goal by using only one key with different variations from each other! Sometimes you will play on a iced field or you will play on a beach. The goal of the game is, to score five goals.

Superhot.description: A first-person shooter game where time moves once you move. Shoot and move around to see your bullets fly off. Stand still and your bullets will stop moving too. This counts for enemy fire as well! Move around and shoot your enemies. Stand still and look for the best ways to move and dodge incoming fire.

Temple Run.description: An infinite runner where the player must escape from his enemy and avoid all the obstacles and traps that are found along the way. Traverse cliffs, forests and even mines, and help this fearless treasure hunter escape with the gold idol. But hurry up! The evil monkey monsters are chasing you!
Temple Run.controls:
[AD] or [Left/Right arrows] - move 
[w] or [Up arrow] - jump 
[s] or [Down arrow] - slide down

Time Shooter 2.description: A shooting game built in the same style as SuperHot, and features the same thrilling action that keeps you determined to beat each level.

Tube Jumpers.description: Stay afloat in the ultimate water-skiing competition! This adventure game lets you play against one, two, or three friends on the same device. In Tube Jumpers, you must bounce upwards to avoid waves, sharks, and other dangers in the water!

Volley Random.description: With fun ragdoll physics and a variety of variations, each match will be different. The playing court, ball and players may change. The important thing is to be able to get score under all conditions.

Zombotron.description: You play a zombie robot, which was given the task to destroy the zombies. Therefore, you are running around, buying new weapons and shooting at everything that moves.
Zombotron.controls:
[WASD] - move 
[Click] - shoot 
[q] - change weapons 
[h] - heal 
[e] - interact

Crossy Road Space.description: The space version of Crossy Road, the 8-bit endless arcade hopper that started it all. Collect custom characters and navigate freeways, railroads, rivers and much more.
Crossy Road Space.controls:
[Space] - move forward
[Arrow Keys] - move left and right

Learn To Fly.description: Launch the penguin as far as you can. At first, it will be very hard, but you can slowly fly a longer distance, make more money, and buy all the upgrades.

Raft Wars.description: A fun, level-based shooting game, where you and your brother Simon will need to defend your treasure from enemies of all kinds!

Cut The Rope.description: Cut the rope to feed candy to the green monster! Om Nom is hungry for large pieces of candy. Your mission is to feed him as quickly as possible. You can collect stars in each level for bonus points. Slice every rope at the right time to win!

Vex 6.description: The sixth platform game in the Vex series. Each level is a labyrinth of deadly devices and traps you have to outsmart.

Smash Karts.description: Smash Karts is a 3D driving game where the objective is to collect surprise boxes and survive using whatever you find in them: Bullets, grenades, even rockets?! Buckle up, wear your helmet, reload your guns and eliminate your opponents!

Worlds Hardest Game 2.description: The second episode of the self-proclaimed world's hardest game series! Hone your reflexes and accuracy as you try to move your little block to the end of each stage without touching the obstacles.

There Is No Game.description: There Is No Game is a tricky, puzzle game (or not game). Disobey the instructions, because there is no game! This funny adventure isn't about rules. In fact, your entire job is to ignore the narrator! Break the title, play with the speaker icon, and unlock mini-games. Try to find the goat!

Flip 3d.description: An addictive puzzle game that tests your logic and patience. The aim of the game is simple ‚Äì you must direct the block into the hole.

Candy Crush.description: Match and decimate clusters of hard candies and tasty fruits in our expansive assortment of Candy Crush games! You can play a classic game of Bejeweled, but with sugary sweets in the place of gemstones. Shift the treats around the board to make matches based on color and shape.

Fortnite 2d.description: A massive multiplayer Battle Royale game in your browser. Players are represented by circular figures on a 2D grid-like playing field, surrounded by a circular blue zone that shrinks as the game advances.
Fortnite 2d.controls:
[WASD] or [Arrows Keys] - move 
[Mouse] - look around 
[e] - interact 
[q] - drop 
[f] - build 
[z] - emotes 
[b] - get unstuck from wall 
[l] - leave modes

Riddle School.description: A fun game of mystery and puzzle solving and the first title in the Riddle School series. You are stuck in school in a boring class and you want to escape! You must interact with various objects in the classrooms and hallway and try to deceive and confuse the teachers and try to leave the school and your boring class!

Riddle School 2.description: A fun game of mystery and puzzle solving and the first title in the Riddle School series. You are stuck in school in a boring class and you want to escape! You must interact with various objects in the classrooms and hallway and try to deceive and confuse the teachers and try to leave the school and your boring class!

Riddle School 3.description: A fun game of mystery and puzzle solving and the first title in the Riddle School series. You are stuck in school in a boring class and you want to escape! You must interact with various objects in the classrooms and hallway and try to deceive and confuse the teachers and try to leave the school and your boring class!

Riddle School 4.description: A fun game of mystery and puzzle solving and the first title in the Riddle School series. You are stuck in school in a boring class and you want to escape! You must interact with various objects in the classrooms and hallway and try to deceive and confuse the teachers and try to leave the school and your boring class!

Riddle School 5.description: A fun game of mystery and puzzle solving and the first title in the Riddle School series. You are stuck in school in a boring class and you want to escape! You must interact with various objects in the classrooms and hallway and try to deceive and confuse the teachers and try to leave the school and your boring class!

Fall Boys.description: A multiplayer battle royale obstacle course. Be the last one standing!

Run 3.description: Try to stay on the track for as long as you can. You can choose from two different modes when playing. In infinite mode, you run for as long as you can. It's your job to try and keep your character from drifting into the vastness of outer space.
